body.name: AICase Stand Fan,Folding Portable Telescopic Floor/USB Desk Fan with 7200mAh Rechargeable Battery,4 Speeds Super Quiet Adjustable Height and Head Great for Office Home Outdoor Camping
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 5 hrs 51 mins
features: 【Multifunctional Standing Fan/Desk Fan】 :This fan is extremely practical and is ideal for both home and office use. Place it at the edge of your sofa or bed and use it as a standing fan , or you place it at your office desk and use it as a desktop fan

【Height and Angles Adjustable】 :The height of the standing/desk fan can be fully adjusted from 3.7" to 39.3" and 180 degree adjustable tilt Angle, which provides you more choices in different height and angle, works flawlessly

【Wireless Working & Bulit-in 7200mAh Battery】 :The AICase standing/desk fan runs on 7200mAh large rechargeable battery, 4 hours full-charged, ensure wireless working 5.5~23.5 hours, 3-speed, working time depends on different speed

【Fold UP Nicely for Easy Storage】 :AICase standing/desk fan is easy to fold up and down, and it folds to be quite small to make it ideal for storage or outdoor using(eg: camping, beach, outdoor picnic), easy to clean
【Super Quiet (30-40db) and 4 wind levels speed design】:breeze wind/soft wind/strong wind/natural wind mode,Meet your different needs.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Feature: There are three anti-skid pads at the bottom, so the fan is very stable. This new upgarded fan can be Rotated 180°, Rotate to fix the pole and pour it forward. It can be Collapsed to a minimum of 36cm, easy to store when you no need it. And can be foled up and placed on the table or placed on the ground. Specification: Main material: Aluminum ABS plastic Steel sheet (motor) PP material (fan blade) Battery type: Lithium battery 18650 Battery capacity: 3.7V 7200mAh Product size: Folded Size: 7.75*7.75*3.64 inch, Stretched Size: 7.75*7.75*38.3 inch Fan size: about 8 Inch Wind speed gear: 3 Color: White Power cord length: 1.5m Net weight of single product: 950g Control method: button type Air supply principle: air circulation Wind mode: 1st gear: soft wind 2nd gear: refreshing wind 3rd gear: strong wind 4th gear: natural wind Charger Specifications: 5V/2A Discharge current: 1st gear: 278MA 2nd gear: 570MA 3rd gear: 970MA Discharge power: 1st gear: 1.3W 2nd gear: 2.8W 3 gear: 4.8W Discharge speed: 1st gear: 1162RPM 2nd gear: 1532RPM 3rd gear: 1864RPM Wind speed: 1st gear: 2.3m/s 2nd gear: 3.0m/s 3rd gear: 4.0m/s Noise decibel: 30-40db Charging time: <4h30m Working time: 1st gear: 23h30m 2nd gear: 9h30m 3nd gear: 5h30m

AICase Folding Fan Mini Telescopic Fan Pedestal Stand Portable Travel USB Rechargeable Table Floor Fan Adjust 180 degrees The head of fan can be adjusted up and down,according to your position and height. Built-in 7200mAH battery Battery Excellent components ensure stable wind,and better user experience. Silicone non-slip Three silicone non-slip pads are used at the bottom to ensure the fan is stable when standing. Small when folded Easily put into the drawer or backpack, and it is easy to carry outside. Easily cleaned Turn counterclockwise to turn on cleaning, and the machine body is wiped with a dry cloth. Don't wash it. After the front mesh is left to dry, align the buckle to replace the fan clockwise.

Instruction for use: In the folded state, pull up and turn on the fan. After turning on the fan, adjust the angle to 90 degrees vertically, then lock the handle device clockwise to fix the angle. The fan can adjust the wind direction 180 degrees up and down. Click the switch to display the power; double-click the switch to turn on the fan 1, 2, 3 gear is wind speed adjustment, 4 gear is natural wind. The fan can adjust the height, pay attention to lightly pull the light rod during use. Please rotate the handle device counterclockwise to release the fan when storing. When the handle device is in place, the fan can be put away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Portable and convenient
reviews.reviewText: I travel with this small fan as I am pretty hot natured. It's quite and provides good air movement. I've even used in the back seat of a truck that has no rear air and it keeps me cool on long rides.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice size, pits out quite a bit of air and noise
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for a cruise we recently went on. Was perfect for drowning out noise, which is what I wanted it for. Also puts out a decent amount of air. The only downside is it will shut off even if you keep it plugged up as it needs to charge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This fan is freakin' amazing! I've bought one for myself and two as gifts for others. The amount of wind power that this little thing manages to produce is a wonder. It's comparable to a traditional desk fan, not a portable fan--and better even than many of those!It folds up small enough to take with you when traveling. (Assuming you're checking luggage and portable cooling is important to you. I mean, it's not pocket sized.) I love that you can adjust the height and angle, so I can have it tilted towards me when I'm applying makeup in a muggy climate.I was pleasantly surprised how long the battery lasted and how quick it was to charge. (Though I do wish there was some indicator of battery life.) I didn't expect it to last long for the amount of oomph it has, but I had no problems. Also, you can run it while plugged in if you're gonna need it for awhile.As others have said, there's a cable but no wall adapter included. It uses a USB-A to micro-USB connector, so most likely any charger you have on hand with a standard USB port will work.The only down side is that it doesn't really function as a floor lamp as advertised, at least where I tried it on carpet. It immediatly tipped over.Seriously though, I love this fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great fan but battery sucks. Repair advice.
reviews.reviewText: So this fan is great minus the battery. I’ve owned it less than a year and it won’t hold a charge. I never travel with it so this wouldn’t normally be a problem except for the fact that it will shut off without a good battery. The issue is either due to crap batteries or a poor implementation of the ip5306. I suspect the latter.If you have the same issue, and you probably will, there is a white sticker on the bottom that looks like the plastic. It’s hiding four screws that will let you disassemble the fan (see pics). You can replace the battery with another 3.7v or move the 5v usb connector to where the battery was plugged in. This worked just fine without dropping the voltage.Edit: The higher voltage did cause some issues. I just didn’t notice right away. Use something like an LM2596 to drop the voltage to 3.7 and you’ll be fine. There are tons of them on Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No need to hunt for an outlet and it’s very breezy!
reviews.reviewText: This fan is awesome. The instructions don’t explain how to use the remote, which is how you set the timer, and there’s no display to tell you how much time you’re setting it for. I’m sure I could find the info online. The best best part is I can move it from room to room, put it where I need it and not plug it in.Even though it’s not a big fan it puts out a nice breeze even on low. I’m in a 2 bed apartment so it’s not like I need it to blow across a large living room. The ability to raise and lower it works too. The pole isn’t the heaviest I’ve soon but it works and that’s what I care about. Also realized today that it will fit neatly back into the compact box for stowing in the closet every Fall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I used this fan to circulate the air in my lower-level family room this past winter. I would sit it about 2 feet away from my wall heater. While this fan is small, it has a lot of power. I love the pivotal head. Since it is spring/summer now, I use it in my work out room. This was/is a good purchase! And it's very quiet! The fan can run on a full charge for about 6 hours on level 1 or 2 speed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We bought this because we absolutely need a fan at night when sleeping and this thing is perfect for traveling and staying at hotels

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the greatest invention ever.
reviews.reviewText: This is amazing. Perfect height for keeping by my bedside, but easy to move to my work desk or anywhere else I need it. I love that it's collapsible. It's quiet, blows cold air, the fan face can tip upwards...it's great. I now own THREE. I want more.

reviews.reviewTitle: El aire con buen chorro y la duración de la carga
reviews.reviewText: Excelente producto. Funciona muy bien. Cumplió mis objetivos

reviews.reviewTitle: Remote doesn't work, batteries out way too soon & cannot find replacements.
reviews.reviewText: I paid extra for this fan. When it came I was very excited. It even had a remote control. But the remote does not work. After 2 months, using it mostly when plugged in, the batteries wore out. I cannot find replacement batteries even on Amazon and cannot find a recharge unit for them. It is 31C inside my house and the fan just sits here unusable.
Not a good product, very flimsy and it stopped working within a month. And there is no way to connect with the customer service.

reviews.reviewTitle: On se demande si les avis sont honnêtes, ne marche pas
reviews.reviewText: J’ai reçu un modèle défectueux.J’ai beau le charger pendant des heures, il m’indique que c’est chargé mais ne veut pas marcherVue la note attribuée au produit, je suis plus que déçu
